Company: U.S. Department of Education, Direct Loan Servicing Online
Description of incident: A faulty Web site software              upgrade resulted in personal information of 21,000 student loan holders              being exposed on the U.S. Department of Education's loan Web site. Information included              names, birthdates, SSNs, addresses, phone numbers, and in some cases,              account information. Affiliated Computer Services Inc. is the contractor              responsible for the breach. The breach did not include those whose              loans are managed through private companies.
